001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.SupportedDevices;
010import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.CreateDuplicateIDPResponse;
011
012/**
013 * Creates a new Insulin Delivery Profile from sourceIdpId with a new title.
014 * The pump copies all profile configurations and segments from sourceIdpId to the new IDP.
015 */
016/**
017 * Creates a new Insulin Delivery Profile from sourceIdpId with a new title.
018 * The pump copies all profile configurations and segments from sourceIdpId to the new IDP.
019 *
020
021 *
022 * <br>
023 *
024 * Request message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.CreateDuplicateIDPResponse}, opCode -26, size 35
025 *
026 * <br>
027 *
028 * 
029 * <table border='1'>
030 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
031 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>-26</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
032 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>35</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
033 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#REQUEST}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
034 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>characteristic</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic#CONTROL}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
035 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>signed</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>true</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
036 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>response</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.CreateDuplicateIDPResponse}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
037 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>modifiesInsulinDelivery</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>true</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
038 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>supportedDevices</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.SupportedDevices#MOBI_ONLY}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
039 * </table>
040 */@MessageProps(
041    opCode=-26,
042    size=35,
043    type=MessageType.REQUEST,
044    characteristic=Characteristic.CONTROL,
045    signed=true,
046    response=CreateDuplicateIDPResponse.class,
047    modifiesInsulinDelivery=true,
048    supportedDevices=SupportedDevices.MOBI_ONLY
049)
050public class CreateDuplicateIDPRequest extends Message { 
051    private String newProfileName;
052    private int sourceIdpId;
053    
054    public CreateDuplicateIDPRequest() {}
055
056    public CreateDuplicateIDPRequest(String newProfileName, int sourceIdpId) {
057        this.cargo = buildCargo(newProfileName, sourceIdpId);
058        this.newProfileName = newProfileName;
059        this.sourceIdpId = sourceIdpId;
060        
061    }
062
063    /**
064     * <table border="1">
065     * <caption>Parsed fields for CreateDuplicateIDPRequest:</caption>
066     * <tr><td><code>newProfileName</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readString(raw, 0, 16)</code></td></tr>
067     * <tr><td><code>sourceIdpId</code></td><td><code>raw[33]</code></td></tr>
068     * </table>
069     */
070    public void parse(byte[] raw) { 
071        raw = this.removeSignedRequestHmacBytes(raw);
072        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size());
073        this.cargo = raw;
074        this.newProfileName = Bytes.readString(raw, 0, 16);
075        // empty 17 - 32
076        this.sourceIdpId = raw[33];
077    }
078
079    
080    /**
081     * <table border="1">
082     * <caption>Byte layout for CreateDuplicateIDPRequest.buildCargo(...):</caption>
083     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
084     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>writeString(newProfileName, 16) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
085     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>writeString(newProfileName, 16) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
086     * <tr><td>2</td><td><code>writeString(newProfileName, 16) [byte 2]</code></td></tr>
087     * <tr><td>3</td><td><code>writeString(newProfileName, 16) [byte 3]</code></td></tr>
088     * <tr><td>4</td><td><code>writeString(newProfileName, 16) [byte 4]</code></td></tr>
089     * <tr><td>5</td><td><code>writeString(newProfileName, 16) [byte 5]</code></td></tr>
090     * <tr><td>6</td><td><code>writeString(newProfileName, 16) [byte 6]</code></td></tr>
091     * <tr><td>7</td><td><code>writeString(newProfileName, 16) [byte 7]</code></td></tr>
092     * <tr><td>8</td><td><code>writeString(newProfileName, 16) [byte 8]</code></td></tr>
093     * <tr><td>9</td><td><code>writeString(newProfileName, 16) [byte 9]</code></td></tr>
094     * <tr><td>10</td><td><code>writeString(newProfileName, 16) [byte 10]</code></td></tr>
095     * <tr><td>11</td><td><code>writeString(newProfileName, 16) [byte 11]</code></td></tr>
096     * <tr><td>12</td><td><code>writeString(newProfileName, 16) [byte 12]</code></td></tr>
097     * <tr><td>13</td><td><code>writeString(newProfileName, 16) [byte 13]</code></td></tr>
098     * <tr><td>14</td><td><code>writeString(newProfileName, 16) [byte 14]</code></td></tr>
099     * <tr><td>15</td><td><code>writeString(newProfileName, 16) [byte 15]</code></td></tr>
100     * <tr><td>16</td><td><code>(byte) sourceIdpId</code></td></tr>
101     * <tr><td>17</td><td><code>(byte) (0)</code></td></tr>
102     * </table>
103     */
104    public static byte[] buildCargo(String newProfileName, int sourceIdpId) {
105        return Bytes.combine(
106            Bytes.writeString(newProfileName, 16),
107            new byte[17],
108            new byte[]{ (byte) sourceIdpId },
109            new byte[]{ 0 }
110        );
111    }
112}
